title: Omega Squad Teemo. ETA? Release Date?
body:
can't find this info anywhere

http://i.imgur.com/9ZS04Xy.jpg

replies.body: Sukishoo is correct, we haven't announced it yet! :]
PLZ release it soon as possible i wanna use it over spring break <3333333{{champion:17}}
no, the correct answer is soon. SOON. SOOOOOOONNNNN!!! BWAAA HAAHAHAHAHAHAA!!!!!!!!!
you sir are very smart
just tell us this : will the release be soon , very soon or after a long time ? ( I cant wait for it anymore,not even urf gets me anymore)
It (most likely) will be released in the next patch at some point.

just let us know right here we wont tell anyone promise :D

j/k I know you cant do that regardless of whether you had that information or not.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Jf6bUIEi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-28T01:32:02.722+0000)
>
> Sukishoo is correct, we haven't announced it yet! :]

give us what we need.

Cool. Thanks!

http://asset-9.soup.io/asset/3036/3226_9c6d.gif

Can't wait!!!
no don't announce it plz no more teemo players cant take it must let it go!!!!
watch this happen:They realease the skin spotlight and all that stuff, then on april first near midnight tweet that its not coming out till season 6. GG RITO.

teemo release cannot be stopped!

http://i.giphy.com/PfQD02h8gcUWQ.gif
That would be because there isn't one.  The most we can guess is it will be sometime during patch 5.7 or 5.8 aka the soonest it would be is in April.
Come on! Release it, please! {{item:3151}} {{champion:32}}
Well its on there but unavailable :-/
I know :C{{item:3070}}
Well, it could happen this Wednesday since patches usually come out every other week and usually in the middle of the week! :P #Teemohype
hmm I hear that it is going to be released on the 8th but then again I highly doubt it
wait tomorrow?
8 april

where did this come from? 

why would they do this on the 8th when rapid fire doesn't end until the 13th?

can't wait!!!

http://fc02.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2013/359/2/c/teemo_gif_by_brysonlikeabaus-d6zbroi.gif
Shut up and take my money!

Well, assuming all testing goes well without any major errors, I'd guess that it will come out some time during next patch.

If that falls through, I'm sure it will be the patch after.

Omega Squad Teemo we need you soon
Best champion in lol  {{champion:17}}
teemo skin today or we riot.

This needs to come out already 
{{champion:17}}

OMG I CANNOT WAIT ANYMORE!!

I bought RP in preparation, and then they release Archduke Nasus, and Pajama Bottom Udyr and UFO corki, and Alien Heimer, and....

...well now I'm back to 0RP again....
I wanna play as {{champion:17}} so bad {{item:3151}} plz
We are all going to hell for playing teemo   :(
A missed opportunity.
Not doing shroom nuke clouds is wrong. Riot is way too pc.
{{champion:17}}  this skin is the coolest thing ever hope it comes out soon.....like really soon
Likely the next patch or two. That's the usual pattern for the time between when a skin is put on the PBE and when it goes to Live.
I'm just curious if it's gonna be on sale for 1350 at release like dunk master Darius
So Is it out right now?
No. It's in the game as of the patch (5.7 today) and it will be released soon.

HEY I JUST BOUGHT THE SKIN IN THE STORE AND NOW IT SAYS IT IS UNAVAILABLE????????
and my rp is gone!!!!
How much will it be sold for when it comes out ?
its a legendary skin so 1820 http://www.newsoflegends.com/index.php/patch-5-7-notes-36748/
this piece of sh** cant wait for it do die, I mean yeah new skin celeb' (where did Hitman 47 go to)
i need this skin lol i have every other teemo skin and this one is the best
It comes out when I tell Riot to release it!
